hero.title: Deliver Your Carpets to Your Customers' Homes Virtually
hero.description: Let your customers experience all the carpets in your product range in their homes, with various size, color and texture options, through their smartphones and buy them with confidence.

product.title: Increase Your Sales With 'See At Home' Technology
product.description: By offering your customers 'See at Home' technology, you can make it easy for them to find the right product for their floors, curtains and furniture. This technology allows them to choose from thousands of products without the need for architectural consultancy, leading to increased sales conversion rates.
product.arNotSupported: AR viewing is only available on compatible mobile devices

about.title: Meet Our Team
about.description: We are a dedicated team of professionals committed to revolutionizing the carpet shopping experience through innovative AR technology.
about.person1Description: 3D Software Engineer, specializing in creating realistic 3D models of carpets.
about.person2Description: Business Development Manager, specializing in creating partnerships with carpet manufacturers.

footer.description: Experience the future of carpet shopping with our augmented reality technology. Try before you buy, right in your own space.
